/usr/bin/cc   -rdynamic CMakeFiles/ark_heat1D_adapt.dir/ark_heat1D_adapt.c.o  -o ark_heat1D_adapt -Wl,-rpath,/root/sundials/build_sundials-3.1.1/src/arkode:/root/sundials/build_sundials-3.1.1/src/nvec_ser ../../../src/arkode/libsundials_arkode.so.2.1.1 ../../../src/nvec_ser/libsundials_nvecserial.so.3.1.1 -lm -lrt -lm
